hero.title: LET'S BUILD CHAMPIONS TOGETHER
hero.subtitle: Transform your fitness journey into an exciting adventure with gamified training, personalized athletic profiles, and smart progress tracking

features.title: Discover The Moment
features.subtitle: An innovative educational system that combines fitness training with engaging gamification

gamification.title: Interactive Challenges & Rewards
gamification.description: Keep the energy alive with fun challenges, daily competitions, and live demonstrations that turn every training moment into an unforgettable experience

athleticProfile.title: Personalized Athletic Profiles
athleticProfile.description: Generate beautiful, printable profiles that showcase your journey, achievements, and growth—designed to inspire and celebrate every milestone

progressTracking.title: Smart Progress Dashboard
progressTracking.description: Track your training stages in real-time, see how many sessions remain, and watch your journey unfold with automatic updates synchronized to your training calendar

rewardSystem.title: Earn & Collect Rewards
rewardSystem.description: Collect coins and points after each training session—pre-programmed rewards that motivate consistent effort and celebrate dedication

philosophy.title: Making Fitness Fun & Empowering
philosophy.subtitle: High appeal: Tap into the growing love for physical challenges and movement, inspired by Discover's philosophy of making fitness fun and empowering
philosophy.forEveryone: Fun for everyone: Courses and activities are designed to engage and challenge all ages and abilities – from young kids to adults seeking excitement

about.title: About The Moment
about.subtitle: An Innovative Sports Concept by Mini Dacri Studio

mission.title: Our Vision
mission.description: We believe that fitness should be exciting, engaging, and accessible to everyone. The Moment transforms traditional training into an interactive journey where every session brings new challenges, achievements, and growth.

gamification.title: Gamified Learning Experience
gamification.description: We've revolutionized fitness education by integrating game mechanics into every aspect of training. Through interactive challenges, daily competitions, and live demonstrations, participants stay motivated and engaged throughout their journey.

athleticProfile.title: Athletic Profile Generation
athleticProfile.description: Every participant receives a personalized athletic profile—a beautifully designed visual representation of their journey. Simply input basic information, and our system generates a professional, printable profile that celebrates achievements and tracks growth milestones.

progressTracking.title: Intelligent Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Parents and participants can log in anytime to see exactly where they are in their training journey. Our smart dashboard shows current training stages, upcoming sessions, and remaining milestones—all automatically synchronized with the structured training calendar.

rewardSystem.title: Automated Reward System
rewardSystem.description: After each training session, participants earn coins and points that appear instantly in the parent dashboard. These rewards are pre-programmed based on the training calendar, ensuring consistent recognition of effort and dedication without manual intervention.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: The Moment reaches up to 60 participants per session from Discover Academy, divided into three teams. We've designed the system to suit all ages and abilities—from young children to adults seeking excitement. Every course and activity is crafted to challenge and engage, making fitness an adventure rather than a routine.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
